entry.title: About me
entry.content:
I am a senior student studying computer science at the University of Liverpool.

I work as a remote research intern supervised by Prof. Fenglong Ma (Penn State University, US). I also work on my final year project under the supervision of Prof. Danushka Bollegala.

My research interests are are vision-language, natural language processing, bioinformatics and AI-composing. I am also actively exploring the fields in visualization

Ongoing Projects

Past Projects

Automatic Background Music Matching Website

In this project we aimed to build a website to provide suitable music for a give clip of video based on its emotion. I am resposible for the algorithm part and database maintainance part.
You can see the demo here: MugicAI demo link.
